Senior Software Engineer          Cognizant technology solution pvt ltd                    July 2018-till present 

Bangalore, India 
 

Role: QlikView/Qliksense Developer 

 
Project Description: Retail Client 

 

As one of the largest cabinet manufacturers in North America, Client has desires of families to ensure that 

cabinetry products meet their needs. Whether moving into a new home or improving their current one, our 

customers want to create their ideal living spaces – and it's our goal to help them. QlikView/QlikSense is the 
primary reporting software. 

 

 

Role: QlikView Developer 

 

Software Engineer                               CGI Information Systems                             Oct 2014 - Jul 2018                                

Bangalore, India 
 

Project Description: Insurance Client 

 

Our client is a leading Risk Management, Insurance and Reinsurance Broking firm in the world with 

operations spanning across 120 countries, headquartered in the UK. At Aon there was an initiative in gearing 

up the MI/BI operations at an Enterprise level, with UK being the centre of operations. QlikView was the 

primary reporting software chosen as a part of this initiative and I was part of the core team handling the 

QlikView Development/Support /Hosting/Server Administration activities for QlikView dashboards from 

UK, EMEA and APAC. 

 



                                         

 

Role: QlikView/Qlksense Developer 

 

As a QlikView/Qliksense developer the role starts from gathering the requirements from business till 

delivering the products to the customer. The process includes checking the data quality and fetching the data 

from various data sources (SQL, Oracle, SharePoint, Salesforce etc.), structuring the data model, 

development of UI, script, unit testing, presenting it to the business and deployment. 

 

Responsibilities: 

 

 Identify process simplification opportunities for overall reporting environment. Work with 
operational reporting team and business partners to automate or simplify existing processes, and 

to remove any manual steps from report generation and delivery. 

 Develop analytical, decision support, and operational reporting on the QlikView. 
 Work with business analysts & key technology partners to identify solutions to their reporting 

needs, develop new reports or modify existing reports. 

 Manage existing report inventory and implement changes to improve the accuracy of reports and 
to decrease the overall number of reports through retirement or consolidation. 

 Work with ETL and Data Warehouse SMEs to manage the development of new report subject 
areas as needed. 

 Work directly with the larger Legal Data Warehouse team to maintain and correct dimensional 
or fact data that impacts report accuracy and availability. 

 Assist in the definition of the database requirements, analyses existing models and reports 
looking for opportunities to improve their efficiency, and resolve technical problems. 

 Ensure that existing reports meet or exceed defined performance and availability targets. Work 
with core DBA and Operate teams to support environment as needed. 

 Deliver all work products to defined best practice standards and ensure high quality results. 
Other Responsibilities: 

 I have hosted the Dashboards which are not developed by us into our Environment. 
 Handled Deployment process of the new/existing dashboard through HPSM Tool where we get the 

approvals from all higher business authority. 

 For the Critical change in the Existing Dashboard need immediate deployment into the production, 
for that need to raise RFC Less procedure to Aon higher official and get it approved. 

 
AWARDS AND ACCOLADES 

 Got first promotion after 1 year 10 Month from ASE to SE. 

 Got two times Apex Award for Outstanding Performance in QlikView Support and Development 
team. 

 Received client appreciations for on time delivery, good service and prompt work around/response.  

 Appreciation from Business for Quality of work delivers

Project 1: 

 

Project     : CE Digital Logbook 

Client     : Samsung (Consumer Electronics Division) 

Technologies    : Qlikview12. 

Role     : Lead Business Analyst. 

SAMSUNG is a Multinational manufacturing Company Specializing in the development of hand held phones & consumer 

electronics headquartered in South Korea. We are developing the different dashboards for Samsung.  

 

Roles & Responsibilities: 

• Attending meeting with clients to Gather requirements. 

• Preparing Design Documents as per the Business Requirements. 

• Preparing an sample template of Dashboard with the help of Design Team. 

• Assisting clients to provide Effort Estimates to develop dashboards. 

• Having meeting with Data base team & understanding data tables helpful for dashboard design. 

• Pulling Tables from data base. 

• Transforming the raw data into structured data format using Qlik Scripting. 

• Designing Dashboards using QlikView. 

• Test and validate the data & dashboards. 

• Deploying Qlik Applications into Server. 

 

Project Description: 

• CE Digital Logbook is an entity in Consumer Electronics department of Samsung. 

• In CE Digital Logbook, we are capturing different types of modules namely Display Share, Counter Share, SEC Count, Sellout, Planograms 

and Target vs Achievement. 

• Display Share is a KPI which shows how much quantity displayed in the store for demo purpose. 

• Counter Share is sellout captured by SEC for all competitors. 

• SEC Count is Count of Samsung employees working on this system. 

• Sellout is sold values capturing from Store. 

• Planogram is place assigned to different competitors to display demo pieces. 

• Target vs Achievement is comparing how the stores and Samsung employees working. 

• CE Digital Logbook gives the complete analysis of sellout of all competitors. 

 

Project 2: 

 

Project     : OAMS (Outdoor Activity Management System) 

Client     : Cheil. 

Technologies    : Qlikview12. 

Role     : Senior QlikView Developer. 

Cheil Worldwide Inc. is a marketing company under the Samsung Group that offers advertising, public relations, shopper 

marketing, digital marketing and etc. It was headquarters in Seoul, South Korea. Its major clients include Samsung, Absolut, Coca Cola and 

etc. Here we are developing dashboards and reports to Samsung. 

 

Roles & Responsibilities: 

• Gathering requirements from Clients. 

• Understanding Business Process. 

• Developing the dashboards and reports for OAMS. 



• Supporting junior developers. 

 

Project Description: 

• OAMS is Outdoor Activity Management System i.e., OAMS is a system of deploying GSB (Glow Sign Board)s, ISB(Interior Sign Board)s 

and different types of fixtures for advertisement purpose. 

• To deploy above different types of Fixtures responsible persons raise tickets with an app. 

• In this project we are tracking the ticket journey and their stages. 

• Main KPIs we are showing here are Ticket Count, Campaign wise & Category wise Analysis, Campaign’s start date and end date analysis 

And how the tickets are moving in different stages Submission, Approval, Recce and Installation stages. 

 

Project 3: 

 

Project     : SRMS (Samsung Retail Maintenance System) 

Client     : Cheil 

Technologies    : Qlikview11 

Role     : QlikView Developer. 

Cheil Worldwide Inc. is a marketing company under the Samsung Group that offers advertising, public relations, shopper 

marketing, digital marketing and etc. It was headquarters in Seoul, South Korea. Its major clients include Samsung, Absolut, Coca Cola and 

etc. Here we are developing dashboards and reports to Samsung. 

 

Roles & Responsibilities: 

• Gathering requirements from Clients. 

• Pulling Tables from different data sources. 

• Developing Dashboards for specified requirements. 

• Implementing incremental reloads to reduce reload time. 

• Set analysis implementation in Visualization part. 

• Deploying applications into Server. 

 

Project Description: 

• SRMS is Samsung Retail Maintenance System 

• Samsung Retail maintenance system is an entity to handle the maintenance of stores. 

• There is an analysis of are different levels of tickets i.e., L1, L2 and L3 

• To track above ticketing syastem we developed different types of reports. 

• Ticket analysis – Open, Problem Fixed, Cancelled, Rejected and Closed. 

• Budget Report – how much PO money assigned to Vendors to close the tickets.
